title: Diamond Geometric Mangalsutra Pendant - A Modern Take on Tradition
features: This pendant features a repeating geometric square design encrusted with sparkling brilliant-cut diamonds. The piece is meticulously crafted with a modern aesthetic, offering a unique alternative to traditional mangalsutra pendants. The secure diamond setting ensures lasting brilliance.
description: This contemporary diamond mangalsutra pendant offers a stylish and modern take on the traditional symbol of marriage. The brilliant-cut diamonds sparkle with exceptional fire and brilliance, making it a sophisticated and eye-catching piece. It is a lightweight and comfortable pendant for daily wear.
